content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle highlights the entrance of the structure, where the intended motion occurs in the z-direction. Therefore, it is crucial to ensure high stiffness along the z-axis while minimizing stiffness along the x and y-axes to prevent damage to the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 250]
  ]
}
```
